page.title: 07TRADING
page.content: The area has one hotel- CREITY HALL owned by the Ritchie family. Next door is a Garden Nursery. Over the Ashmill burn is DOUNE MOTORS LTD a motor repair garage & general haulage firm with M.O.T. Testing Station but without petrol pumps. LOCH-HILL INDUSTRIAL ESTATE This contains 5 small businesses:- 1 Haulage Contractor 2 Joiners 1 Welder & Car Repairer/Haulier 1 Plant Hire firm wth Container Gas and Peat Fuel for sale. Deanston village has 1 shop selling groceries and stationery. This shop is also a sub Post Office from which mail is uplifted twice daily. Farmers sell their potato crops in the field. Livestock is mainly sold via a Stirling market. Farm produce is rarely sold direct to the public.
